info.brief_description: celebrate a hypnotic holiday with your favorite fictional characters
info.description:
Suggested by Secptor. similar to my story Happy Hypno Holidays, but instead of a family of OCs, you have holiday themed hypnosis for various fictional characters within their own shows.

Here are some rules
https://www.writing.com/main/view_item/item_id/1959115-Hamn8rs-rules
Any hypnosis must be holiday-themed and/or happen near or on that holiday. so for Christmas, hypnosis must be Christmas-themed and/or happen near Christmas.
When you start a Holiday thread, write out a bit of the events, and leave options for how they will do the holiday hypnosis at the end.
